title: (x) Siemens "mobile" - Siemens Sans (proprietary) {Romesh}
content:
im looking for the name of the font in the mobile word ...no the siemens font   
 [http://www.brandsoftheworld.com/\_data/objects/50018/logo\_thumbnail.gif](http://web.archive.org/web/20110620235215/http:/www.brandsoftheworld.com/_data/objects/50018/logo_thumbnail.gif)   
thanks   
   
Joel melero
author: anonymous

comments.content:
Siemens Sans designed by past assistant of booth Matthew Carter and Adrian Frutiger: Hans Jurg Hunziker who in fact done the final drawings for Frutiger typeface in the 70's.   
   
So, Yves: toute ressemble n'est pas fortuite.
(YEEESSS, we all refer to the "Mobile" word.)

Could be [Frutiger](http://web.archive.org/web/20110620235215/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/frutiger/65-bold/testdrive.html?s=mobile&p=36), but the bitmapping makes it hard   
to recognize accurately.

Here you can find it in EPS format [http://web.brandsoftheworld.com/?id=112&query\_id=3367602&page=5&brand\_id=50018](http://web.archive.org/web/20110620235215/http:/web.brandsoftheworld.com/?id=112&query_id=3367602&page=5&brand_id=50018)   
thanks for your help
Thanks for your help ...but im looking for the font that they use in the WORD MOBILE...
That's what Romesh gave you, Joel!
siemens uses a custom corporate typeface. (siemens sans)
